shape_3_init1=
shape_3_init2=it=  100;          //////// impacts framerate !
shape_3_init3=
shape_3_init4=/////// Mandelbrot's fractal
shape_3_init5=
shape_3_init6=zoomy=1; 
shape_3_init7=
shape_3_init8=ni=1*1024;      i=0;       loop(ni,
shape_3_init9=
shape_3_init10=x = -1.5+2* (i%ni)/ni;     y =  -1+2* (i%sqrt(ni))/sqrt(ni);
shape_3_init11=
shape_3_init12=zr=x;    zi=y;
shape_3_init13=
shape_3_init14=g=0;   r=0;     loop(it,
shape_3_init15=
shape_3_init16=zrt=zr;     zr=zr*zr-zi*zi+x;    zi=2*zrt*zi+y;   
shape_3_init17=r=r-.1*above(zr*zr+zi*zi,4);     g=g+.2*above(zr*zr+zi*zi,4);   );
shape_3_init18=
shape_3_init19=gmegabuf(2*i) = r; 
shape_3_init20=gmegabuf(2*i+1) = g;               i=i+1;);
shape_3_per_frame1=i=instance;        sqni=sqrt(num_inst);
shape_3_per_frame2=
shape_3_per_frame3=x= int(i/sqni);        //// grid
shape_3_per_frame4=y= i-x*sqni;
shape_3_per_frame5=
shape_3_per_frame6=x=-.5+x/sqni;
shape_3_per_frame7=y=-.5+y/sqni;
shape_3_per_frame8=
shape_3_per_frame9=
shape_3_per_frame10=t=10*sin(.022*time);
shape_3_per_frame11=mx= tan(t*x-y)/t;//x*sin(t)+y*cos(t)+.5;
shape_3_per_frame12=my= cos(y/x-t)+t;//y*sin(t)-x*cos(t)+.5;
shape_3_per_frame13=
shape_3_per_frame14=mx= sqni*int(sqni*mx);       ///// rotation of a square matrix using the index
shape_3_per_frame15=my= int(sqni*my);
shape_3_per_frame16=
shape_3_per_frame17=i2=mx+my;
shape_3_per_frame18=
shape_3_per_frame19=r =gmegabuf(2*i2    );    
shape_3_per_frame20=g =gmegabuf(2*i2  +1); 
shape_3_per_frame21=b =gmegabuf(2*i2  -1);
shape_3_per_frame22=r2=gmegabuf(.75*i2  );
shape_3_per_frame23=g2=gmegabuf(.75*i2+1);
shape_3_per_frame24=b2=gmegabuf(.75*i2-1);
shape_3_per_frame25=a =gmegabuf(.33*i2  );
shape_3_per_frame26=a2=gmegabuf(.33*i2+1);
shape_3_per_frame27=//r2=r; g2=g;
shape_3_per_frame28=
shape_3_per_frame29=
shape_3_per_frame30=zoom=.8;
shape_3_per_frame31=y=.5+zoom*y;
shape_3_per_frame32=x=.5+zoom*x/q1;
shape_3_per_frame33=rad=rad*zoom*sin(time*fps);
per_frame_init_1=loop(10000, gmegabuf(i)=0;  i=i+1;);
per_frame_init_2=
per_frame_init_3=
per_frame_init_4=t0=frame;
per_frame_1=vol=(bass+treb+mid)*.01;
per_frame_2=atime=atime+vol;
per_frame_3=q1=aspecty;
per_frame_4=q2=sin(atime)*.1;
per_frame_5=q3=cos(atime*.58438289)*.3;
per_frame_6=q4=sin(atime*.43994939)*.3;
per_frame_7=q5=cos(atime*.38488594)*.3;
per_frame_8=q6=sin(atime*.24888549)*.3;
per_frame_9=q7=cos(atime*.13288438)*.3;
per_frame_10=q8=sin(atime*.84833484)*.3;
warp_1=`float3 color, mus;
warp_2=`float dx,dy;
warp_3=`
warp_4=`shader_body {
warp_5=`float corr = texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`float2 uv1 = (uv-.5);
warp_8=`float2 uv6 = uv1;
warp_9=`
warp_10=`float rota = lum(tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,uv/4))*q31;
warp_11=`
warp_12=`uv6 = mul(uv1,float2x2(cos(rota),-sin(rota),sin(rota),cos(rota)));
warp_13=`uv6 += sin(q32*uv1);
warp_14=`mus = .2/(sqrt(uv6.x)+.2);
warp_15=`
warp_16=`mus *= float3 (1.1,1,.95);
warp_17=`mus *= .9+.1*tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,uv);
warp_18=`
warp_19=`float3 blur = GetBlur1(frac(uv));
warp_20=`
warp_21=`float2 hor = float2 (0.005,0);
warp_22=`float2 ver = float2 (0,.005);
warp_23=`
warp_24=`float dx = lum(tex2D(sampler_main,uv+hor) 
warp_25=`         - tex2D(sampler_main,uv-hor));
warp_26=`float dy = lum(tex2D(sampler_main,uv+ver) 
warp_27=`         - tex2D(sampler_main,uv-ver));
warp_28=`
warp_29=`
warp_30=`float2 zz = float2 (dx,dy);
warp_31=`
warp_32=`float3 crisp= tex2D(sampler_main,uv+zz*.02);
warp_33=`float3 crisp2 = tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
warp_34=`crisp += crisp2/2;
warp_35=`crisp *= .67;
warp_36=`crisp +=.08 * mus - length(zz)*blur;
warp_37=`
warp_38=`float3 ret1 = crisp - lum(blur)*.04;
warp_39=`ret = ret1 * .99 -  .04 ;
warp_40=`}
comp_1=`sampler sampler_rose;
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`
comp_5=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).z,
comp_6=`
comp_7=`ret = lerp (
comp_8=`GetBlur1(uv).z + GetBlur3(uv).z,
comp_9=`ret,
comp_10=`pow(ret,1));
comp_11=`  
comp_12=`ret = pow(ret,float3(.8,2,8))*1.25 - .25;
comp_13=`
comp_14=`//ret *= GetBlur2(uv+float2(0,.01)).y*1.2;
comp_15=`//ret *= abs(GetBlur1(uv).y-GetBlur3(uv).y);
comp_16=`
comp_17=`ret *= GetBlur2(uv+float2(0,.01)).z*1.2;
comp_18=`
comp_19=`ret *= .2+.8*abs(GetBlur1(uv).z-GetBlur3(uv).z);
comp_20=`
comp_21=`ret *= 4; //gamma
comp_22=`
comp_23=`//ret *= 1-tex2D(sampler_main, uv).x;
comp_24=`
comp_25=`//ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv),
comp_26=`
comp_27=`}
